author: Victoria Gatenby
title: Malawi: Workers relieved as court blocks COVID-19 lockdown plan
description: Workers in Malawi say they are relieved a High Court judge blocked the government's plan for a 21-day lockdown.
content:
The government of Malawi wanted to impose a 21-day lockdown to slow the spread of the coronavirus.
However, a High Court judge blocked the plan on Friday because of the devastating impact it would have on workers who would lose their incomes.
Workers say th… [+122 chars]
